name: CLM_VALUES_PRESC_PROV_ID
description: This table contains information for prescribing provider identifiers.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim value record

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PROV_IDENT
columns.description: Prescribing provider identifier. This does not necessarily correspond to a Chronicles Provider ID and should not be used to join to the CLARITY_SER table.
